original_text: So the priest gave the holy bread to David because he did not have any other bread. This was the bread which had been on the table in the Lord's tent. The priest would take it from there each day and he would put hot, fresh bread in its place.
korean_text: 제사장이 그 거룩한 떡을 주었으니 거기는 진설병 곧 여호와 앞에서 물려 낸 떡밖에 없었음이라 이 떡은 더운 떡을 드리는 날에 물려 낸 것이더라

sentences.original_text: So the priest gave the holy bread to David
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 제사장은 다윗에게 거룩한 빵을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: because he did not have any other bread
which had been on the table
The priest would take it from there each day
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 매일 그곳에서 그 빵을 가져갔습니다

sentences.original_text: and he would put hot, fresh bread in its place
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 자리에 따뜻하고 신선한 빵을 놓았습니다
